Utterance.UttText: In bed 15 is Gareth Simpson, 34 yrs old under Dr Gerard, came in with epilepsy and for medication adjustment.

Candidate.CandidatePreferred: Medications:Presence or Identity:Duration of the study:^Patient:Nominal

Utterance.UttText: He had no seizures today and the doctor's are planning that he can be discharged tom.
